snippet: ] The United States has closed its embassy in Yemen to the public because of security concerns, the State Department said in a statement on Wednesday, citing recent attacks against Western interests in Yemen as the reason for temporarily suspending...
abstract: United States closes its embassy in Sana, Yemen, to the public because of security concerns, citing attacks against Western interests in Yemen as the reason for temporarily suspending operations
lead_paragraph: ] The United States has closed its embassy in Yemen to the public because of security concerns, the State Department said in a statement on Wednesday, citing recent attacks against Western interests in Yemen as the reason for temporarily suspending operations at the embassy in Sana.

headline.main: American Embassy in Yemen Is Closed
headline.print_headline: American Embassy in Yemen Is Closed
